description: Comprehensive security analytics and threat intelligence platform

The security stack provides 100% device coverage with 19 active integrations delivering multi-layered protection across 5 domains. Recent monitoring detected 17 security events with 11 successfully resolved, showing responsive security operations and strong incident response capabilities.
